LanguageData.OE_ServoArm.label: obsidia proto servo-arm
LanguageData.OE_ServoArm.description: Proto servo-arm, perfectly enhances the user’s manipulation. Designed for use by Obsidia Empire warriors several centuries ago.
LanguageData.ODC_ServoArm.label: ODC Nomad servo-arm
LanguageData.ODC_ServoArm.description: Servo-arm, well enhances the user’s manipulation. Designed for use by Obsidia Drifters.
LanguageData.CAC_ServoArm.label: CAC Cultist servo-arm
LanguageData.CAC_ServoArm.description: Battle servo-arm, well enhances the user’s manipulation. Designed and modified for use by CAC Cultists.
